messageBody:
Hi,

I have a client server application. The client connects with a remote server (3rd party) and sends/receives different kinds of messages.

For my Junit test cases I am implementing my own server which simulates the behavior of the 3rd party server.

Whats the best approach to test this.

- Where do I include the code that actually launches my local test server (should this part of Junit test package)
- For each message type (exchanged b/w client and my test server) that I will be testing, do I kick start / shut down the server (seperately for each test case)
